summary:
Simple Follower Request.
Are You Up For The Job?
descriptionHtml:
This Character Needs To Be Converted Into A Follower Who Is Up For The Job?.

Basicily This Is My Skyrim Character 
And It Needs To Be Converted Into A Follower For Private Use

Current Loadout

-Silver Greatsword Dmg Needs To Be 150 To Be A Decent Follower.

-Wolf Armor Def Needs To Be 150 To Be A Decent Follower.

-Wolf Gauntlets Def Needs To Be 125 To Be A Decent Follower.

-Wolf Boots Def Needs  To Be 125 To Be A Decent Follower.

-Cape Nothing To Be Added To It .

Follower Voice Files Can Be The Files Of Vilkas From The Companions.

Additional Information

-Ref ID : 0003d890

-Location Of The Follower : The Jorrvaskr Roaming Around The Building.

-Faction : Jorrvaskr

-Levels With Player

In The Download Section Contains My Current Save File Of The Character .

Respond In The Comment Section / E-mail 

E-mail May Only Be Used As Contact For The Follower

E-mail : hegylevonstargazer@hotmail.nl
author: Hegyle Von StarGazer
